item.title: 特斯拉将收购德国零部件制造商 Manz 的部分资产
item.description: 美国汽车制造商特斯拉（Tesla）周二表示，将收购破产的德国高科技零部件制造商曼兹公司（Manz AG）的部分股权，其中包括该公司位于德国西南部罗伊特林根市（Reutlingen）工厂的 300 多名员工。【原文：U.S. carmaker Tesla will acquire parts of the insolvent German high-tech parts maker Manz AG , including more than 300 employees at its site in Reutlingen city in the southwest, the German company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳与德比尔斯公司签署拖延已久的钻石协议
item.description: 博茨瓦纳政府周二与英美资源集团（Anglo American）旗下的戴比尔斯公司（De Beers）签署了一项拖延已久的钻石销售协议，并表示希望该协议能在博茨瓦纳经济低迷之际创造就业机会。【原文：Botswana's government on Tuesday signed a long-delayed diamonds sales agreement with Anglo American unit De Beers, saying it hoped it would create jobs at a time when the economy is in a slump.】

item.title: Arc'teryx 所有者 Amer Sports 认为今年销售增长放缓
item.description: 体育用品集团 Amer Sports 周二发布第四季度业绩报告称，受旗下昂贵品牌 Arc'teryx 的推动，该公司在 2024 年强劲增长后，今年的销售额增长将有所下降。【原文：Sportswear group Amer Sports sees lower sales growth this year after a strong 2024, the company said on Tuesday as it reported fourth-quarter results boosted by its expensive Arc'teryx brand.】

item.title: 美国贸易关税迫在眉睫，欧盟承诺支持钢铁行业
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二表示，将在春季提出计划，以提高欧洲濒临崩溃的钢铁行业的竞争力，并使其免受迫在眉睫的美国贸易关税的影响。【原文：The EU Commission on Tuesday said it will present plans to make Europe's ailing steel sector more competitive and to shield it from looming U.S. trade tariffs in the spring.】

item.title: 礼来推出高剂量小瓶减肥药，价格比注射笔低 150 美元
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周二表示，该公司已开始在美国销售高剂量的流行减肥药 Zepbound 瓶剂，价格比注射笔剂便宜 150 美元，以进一步刺激对该药的需求。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Tuesday it has begun selling higher doses of its popular weight-loss drug Zepbound in vials in the U.S. at a $150 discount to the cost of the injector pen versions, as it seeks to spur further demand for the medicine.】

item.title: 市场权衡贸易风险，期货下跌，英伟达业绩前下跌
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货下滑，芯片公司和超级大盘股疲软，投资者消化了唐纳德-特朗普总统新的关税言论，英伟达（Nvidia）在万众期待的财报发布前一天下跌了 1.5%。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Tuesday, led by weakness across chip companies and megacaps, as investors digested fresh tariff comments from President Donald Trump and Nvidia dropped 1.5% a day ahead of its keenly awaited results.】

item.title: 日本汽车业寻求政府帮助抵御美国关税
item.description: 日本汽车工业协会周二敦促政府设法保护日本汽车制造商免受美国可能对进口汽车和零部件征收关税的影响。【原文：Japan's automobile industry association urged the government on Tuesday to try to shield Japanese automakers from tariffs that the United States may impose on imports of autos and parts.】

item.title: 裕信银行俄罗斯分行在俄罗斯化工法庭起诉德国分行
item.description: 裕信银行的年度报告显示，该银行的俄罗斯子公司去年起诉了这家意大利银行在德国的分支机构，这是一起法庭案件的一部分，涉及裕信银行因制裁而无法在俄罗斯履行的担保付款。【原文：UniCredit's Russian subsidiary last year sued the Italian bank's own German arm as part of a court case relating to guarantee payments in Russia which UniCredit could not honour because of sanctions, the lender's annual report showed.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国经济放缓引发担忧，标普500指数失守6000点关口
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 百度以 21 亿美元收购 JOYY 在中国的直播业务
item.description: 百度周二表示，它已以约 21 亿美元的价格收购了社交媒体公司 JOYY 在中国大陆的直播业务，这家搜索引擎巨头希望借此实现收入来源的多元化。【原文：Baidu said on Tuesday it has acquired social media firm JOYY's live-streaming business in mainland China for about $2.1 billion, as the search engine giant looks to diversify its revenue stream.】

item.title: 加拿大丰业银行和蒙特利尔银行因资本市场和财富管理业务强劲而实现利润增长
item.description: 受资本市场和财富管理业务收入强劲的推动，加拿大丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）和蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）周二公布的季度利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Canada's Bank of Nova Scotia and Bank of Montreal on Tuesday beat analysts' expectations for quarterly profit driven by strong income from capital markets and wealth management businesses.】

item.title: 洞察力：DeepSeek 急于推出新的人工智能模型，中国正全力以赴
item.description: DeepSeek 希望将优势扩大。【原文：DeepSeek is looking to press home its advantage.】

item.title: 家得宝预计全年同店销售增长低于预期
item.description: 本周二，家得宝公司（Home Depot）预计全年同店销售增长低于分析师预期，因为这家美国顶级家居装饰连锁店正在应对房地产市场疲软和借贷成本上升导致的大额项目支出放缓。【原文：Home Depot forecast annual same-store sales growth below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, as the top U.S. home improvement chain contends with a slowdown in spending on big-ticket projects amid a weak housing market and higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 独家报道特立尼达将寻求美国延长壳牌委内瑞拉天然气项目的期限
item.description: 四位接近筹备工作的消息人士称，特立尼达和多巴哥计划请求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府延长壳牌和特立尼达国家天然气公司（NGCTT.UL）在委内瑞拉开发一个关键天然气项目的许可期限。【原文：Trinidad and Tobago plans to ask U.S. President Donald Trump's administration to extend a license for Shell and Trinidad's National Gas Company (NGCTT.UL) to develop a key gas project in Venezuela, four sources close to the preparations said.】

item.title: 浑水公司的卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）考虑进军印度，可能会考虑只做多头、做空头的基金
item.description: 他告诉路透社，美国投资者卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）正在权衡设立印度基金的计划，该基金可能采用 "只做多 "或 "做多做空 "的策略，但不会关注该国的激进卖空行为。【原文：U.S. investor Carson Block is weighing plans for an India fund which could be based on a 'long-only' or 'long-short' strategy but would not look at activist short-selling in the country, he told Reuters.】

item.title: Blume Venture 的报告称，印度的速卖通行业可能难以维持目前的增长势头
item.description: 据 Blume Ventures 的一份报告称，由于向大城市以外地区的扩张仍然有限，以及来自大型电子商务企业的竞争加剧，印度蓬勃发展的快速电子商务行业可能难以保持目前的增长速度。【原文：India's booming quick-commerce sector may struggle to maintain its current pace of growth as expansion beyond major cities remains limited and competition from larger e-commerce players intensifies, according to a report by Blume Ventures.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴将发布开源版视频生成人工智能模型
item.description: 中国科技巨头阿里巴巴周二在 X 上发文称，将发布开源版视频和图像生成人工智能模型 Wan 2.1。【原文：Alibaba will release an open-source version of its video and image-generating AI model, Wan 2.1, the Chinese tech giant said in a post on X on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，起亚美国公司将召回超过 13.7 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，起亚美国公司将在美国召回137256辆汽车，原因是活塞油环可能制造不正确，可能导致发动机损坏。【原文：Kia America is recalling 137,256 vehicles in the United States over concerns that piston oil rings may have been manufactured incorrectly, which can result in engine damage, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 台湾芯片制造商 Vanguard 称特朗普威胁征收关税可能加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商万佳国际半导体公司周二警告说，美国对进口芯片征收关税可能会刺激通胀并影响全球经济增长，但该公司表示，预计对公司的直接影响不大。【原文：Taiwanese chip maker Vanguard International Semiconductor warned on Tuesday that U.S. tariffs on imported chips could spur inflation and impact global economic growth, but said it expects the direct impact on the company would be small.】

item.title: 壳牌预计到 2040 年全球液化天然气需求将增长 60
item.description: 壳牌周二在一份年度报告中说，到2040年，全球对液化天然气的需求预计将增加约60%，这主要是受亚洲经济增长、人工智能的影响以及重工业和运输业减排努力的推动。【原文：Global demand for liquefied natural gas is estimated to rise by around 60% by 2040, driven largely by economic growth in Asia, AI impact and efforts to cut emissions in heavy industries and transportation, Shell said in an annual report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 香港高等法院撤回针对世茂的清盘申请
item.description: 世茂集团周二表示，香港高等法院已下令撤回京东方领汇投资对中国房地产公司世茂集团提出的清盘呈请。【原文：The Hong Kong High Court has ordered the withdrawal of the winding-up petition against Chinese property company Shimao Group filed by CPYM Link Investment, Shimao said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿布扎比阿提哈德航空公司计划本周宣布首次公开募股 - 消息人士
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，阿布扎比阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）的目标是在本周宣布启动价值 10 亿美元的首次公开募股，这将是近两年来海湾地区大型航空公司的首次公开募股。【原文：Abu Dhabi's Etihad Airways aims to announce the launch of a $1 billion initial public offering this week, two sources told Reuters, in what would be the first IPO of a major Gulf airline in nearly two years.】

item.title: 美联储洛根提出贴现窗口贷款拍卖机制的构想
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周二提出了将美联储资产负债表的 "适度 "部分分配给贷款和回购的想法，或许可以举行贴现窗口贷款的每日拍卖。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan on Tuesday floated the idea of allocating a "modest" part of the Fed's balance sheet to loans and repos, perhaps holding a daily auction of discount-window loans.】

item.title: 烟幕弹：食品及药物管理局打压后，一些 Vape 公司开始转向
item.description: 据美国监管机构和两家公司的代表称，一些被美国当局列为目标的电子烟公司已经改变了业务模式或公司结构，包括将业务转移到离岸公司。【原文：Some e-cigarette companies targeted by U.S. authorities have altered their business model or changed their corporate structure, including by transferring operations to offshore firms, according to a U.S. regulator and representatives of two companies.】

item.title: 韩国政局动荡促使企业自行解决关税问题
item.description: 韩国商界领袖正采取行动抵消美国总统唐纳德-特朗普咄咄逼人的贸易政策带来的威胁，他们雇佣了特朗普的前助手，并游说共和党各州，因为他们对陷入政治危机的本国政府的拖延感到沮丧。【原文：South Korea's business leaders are taking action to offset the threat posed by U.S. President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies, hiring his former aides and lobbying Republican states out of frustration with delays by their own government which is mired in a political crisis.】

item.title: 日本全日空航空公司将从波音、空中客车和巴西航空工业公司购买至少 77 架飞机
item.description: 日本全日空控股公司周二表示，将斥资约2.1万亿日元（140亿美元）购买至少77架飞机，以补充其机队。【原文：Japan's ANA Holdings said on Tuesday it would spend about 2.1 trillion yen ($14 billion) to purchase at least 77 aircraft to replenish its fleet.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官表示，预计夏季票价将上涨 4-6
item.description: 瑞安航空首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周二在华沙举行的新闻发布会上说，瑞安航空预计今年夏季票价将上涨 4-6%。【原文：Ryanair expects summer fares to rise 4-6% this year, CEO Michael O'Leary said at a press conference in Warsaw on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟法院支持意大利针对谷歌限制安卓汽车的反垄断裁决
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周二支持意大利反垄断机构的观点，意大利反垄断机构四年前曾对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司处以罚款，原因是谷歌拒绝让 Enel 公司开发的电动汽车应用程序访问其 Android Auto 平台。【原文：Europe's top court on Tuesday sided with Italy's antitrust authority which fined Alphabet unit Google four years ago for refusing to allow an e-mobility app developed by Enel access to its Android Auto platform.】

item.title: 比特币一个月来首次跌破 90,000 美元，以太币暴跌
item.description: 加密货币比特币和以太坊周二跌至数月低点，陷入了普遍的跨市场抛售，交易员们还在继续处理上周加密交易所比比特（Bybit）价值 15 亿美元的以太坊被黑客攻击的事件。【原文：Cryptocurrencies bitcoin and ether dropped to multi-month lows on Tuesday, caught up in a general cross-market sell-off, and as traders continued to process last week's hack of $1.5 billion worth of ether from cryptoexchange Bybit.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR、Fountainvest 和 PAG 均对星巴克中国股份虎视眈眈
item.description: 四位消息人士称，KKR & Co、方源资本（Fountainvest Partners）和 PAG 等收购公司有意收购星巴克中国业务的股份，因为这家美国咖啡连锁店正寻求重振其第二大市场的销售业绩。【原文：KKR & Co , Fountainvest Partners and PAG are among buyout firms interested in acquiring a stake in Starbucks' China business, four sources said, as the U.S. coffee chain looks to revive flagging sales in its second-largest market.】
